name: Patterna
description: Patterna is a logic puzzle game for people who think that HexCells is far too easy. It features a highly customizable random level generator, a level editor, more than 70 levels, and an enchanting minimalist soundtrack by Alex Cottrell.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: Core2Duo or more recent, but should also run on a Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2 or DirectX9 capable graphics device DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great puzzle game, carries on where Minesweeper left off. Every puzzle is soluble without guessing, and you can choose your level of difficulty.
After a sudden crash my 2-hour progress is gone. Wouldn't recommend.
